name: 28 Brains Later (Incomplete)
description:
a very rough unfinished gamemaker game i made back in university in 2012

Controls:

Arrow keys - movement

Enter - pause game

Esc - exit game

Mouse to click menu items

The file is a Game Maker Executable file, so just make sure you have Game Maker to run it.

The game saves automatically when paused, and when loaded will load to the pause screen.
